name: Puntito - Magic Adventure
description:
Join Puntito in his Magic Adventure and defend the Realm of Fantasy from the invading evil monsters. Defeat your enemies and gain elemental powers!

Únete a Puntito en su Aventura Mágica y defiende el Reino de la Fantasía de los maléficos monstruos invasores. Derrota a tus enemigos y obtén poderes elementales!

----

Important note: The game is still in development, we would apreciate a lot if you leave a comment below with your feedback. Thank you!

Dreamhouse Games SpA. All rights reserved.

Controls

- Basic Abilities:

Mouse: Aim
Mouse 1: Fire magic
Mouse 2: Ice Magic

- Special Abilities (cooldown based):

E+E+E:    Airshot (Always available)
Q+Q+Q: Ignition (Always available)
Q+E+Q:  Oannes' Fury (Unlockable in Air Ship Map)
E+E+Q:   Nature Shield (Unlockable in Garden Map)
Q+Q+E:  Nether Void (Unlockable in Ice Vortex Map)
Q+E+E:   Multiblaze (Unlockable in Lava Map)
